operations.command:
uv run python3 -c "
from live.backend.api import streamer as api_streamer
print(f'api_streamer ID after import: {id(api_streamer)}')

from live.backend.api import streamer as api_streamer2
print(f'api_streamer ID second import: {id(api_streamer2)}')
print(f'Same instance? {api_streamer is api_streamer2}')

from live.backend.orchestrator import get_orchestrator
orch = get_orchestrator()
print(f'orch.streamer ID: {id(orch.streamer)}')
print(f'Same as api_streamer? {orch.streamer is api_streamer}')
"

operations.command:
uv run python3 -c "
from live.backend.api import streamer as api_streamer
print(f'1. api_streamer ID: {id(api_streamer)}')

from live.backend.orchestrator import get_orchestrator
print(f'2. Getting orchestrator...')
orch = get_orchestrator()
print(f'3. orch.streamer ID: {id(orch.streamer)}')
print(f'4. Same as api_streamer? {orch.streamer is api_streamer}')
" 2>&1 | grep -E "(api_streamer|orchestrator|DEBUG)"
